mapper.select: /*회원모두보여주기*/ SELECT user_id_code as userId ,user_pw as userPw ,user_name as userName ,user_contact as userContact ,user_email as userEmail ,user_withdraw_status as userStatus ,user_activity_area as userArea ,user_retention_Points as userPoint ,user_rating as userRating ,user_reg_date as userRreDate ,user_update_date as userUpDate ,level_num_code as userLevel from tb_u_all_user

/*판매가 비지니스 탑카테고리*/ SELECT g.goods_top_category_name as goodsTopCategoryName ,g.goods_top_category_code as goodsTopCategoryCode ,g.user_id_code as userIdocde ,g.goods_top_category_reg_date as goodsTopCategoryRegDate FROM tb_g_goods_top_category as g

select g.goods_sub_category_code ,g.goods_sub_category_name ,g.goods_sub_category_reg_date ,g.goods_top_category_code ,g.goods_top_category_name from tb_g_goods_sub_category as g where g.goods_top_category_code = #{topCategory};

/*로그인을 위한 정보조회*/ SELECT u.user_id_code ,u.user_pw ,u.user_name ,u.user_contact ,u.user_email ,u.user_activity_area ,u.user_retention_Points ,u.user_rating ,u.level_num_code FROM tb_u_all_user as u WHERE u.user_id_code = #{userId};
